2fa.title: Two Step Authentication (2FA)
2fa.enable_message: The first step is to download the Google Authenticator app for your Andriod or iOS device. If you need help getting started, please see Google Support Page If you do not have access to the Andriod Market or App Store, there are other options for getting Google Authenticator:, Andriod Download, Google Chrome Plugin, or iTunes App Store
2fa.post_script: The token will not be shown again after 2FA is enabled. If you have multiple devices, add your account token to all of them before clicking enable. (Note:Your Account Token will change each time you reload your browser.)

amount.min: Make sure you have input the minimum withdrawal amount

code.matches: Code must only contain letters, numbers, dashes, and underscores

discount.min: Amount should be at least zero
discount.maxi: Should be less than total amount
discount.max: Percentage should not be greater than 100

uses_per_coupon.min: Amount should be at least one

uses_per_customer.max: Should be less than or equal to uses per coupon
